entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Atikokan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:44 PM EST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Atikokan 9:00 PM EST Saturday 11 March 2023
Temperature: -7.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -11.4°C
Wind: ENE 17 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 6:58 PM EST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:58 PM EST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 6:58 PM EST Saturday 11 March 2023
